alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:09AM EST until February 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 9 inches. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook and Northwest Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
